content.title: Thank you for your support!
content.creator:
MECHÂ·ONE
February 27, 2025
content.content:
Hello Backer,
Thank you for making the MOTOR-ZERO 3.0 a great success once again by supporting our products, your support will always be the driving force behind our continued innovation!
I am also pleased to inform you that our production is already underway and thanks to our years of accumulated experience in the supply chain related to razor products, we are fully confident that we will be able to deliver according to the scheduled date.
Additionally, we are seeing that some backers are still showing reject failures, which will make it impossible to pre-order the product! I want you to know that you only have 7 days to resolve this issue on Kickstarter. Once you miss this â€˜Golden Weekâ€™, I will have a hard time guaranteeing that you will be able to purchase this product at a discounted price. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me!
Our official customer service email: support@mation.top
For MOTOR-ZERO 3.0 supporters, we are also offering a 15% discount on the entire category on our website (mation.top). All you need to do is enter the promo code: (KBGJ678A0XAR) when submitting your order to receive the discount.
Thanks again for supporting MOTOR-ZERO 3.0!
Best.
MATION Team
